price: Gutyo inyuma y'ikurwako rya nya cago bakagarariza mu guhakana inema zacu Twebwe Allah Twabahaye, hatibagiwe no kubakurako ivyago. Bahakanyi! Nimuryoherwe rero mwidagadure gato mu buzima bwo kw’isi, muzoheza mumenye iherezo ry’ubuhakanyi bwanyu.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
